metadata.feature_description: Test and validate URL rewriting functionality with detailed results

steps.action: Navigate to URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL tab displays with URL to Test input field and Test URL Rewriting button
steps.actual: TEST URL tab displayed correctly with all expected fields

steps.action: Enter valid URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: URL rewriting results should show rewritten path, identified page, and culture
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Culture: en-US

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with complex query strings

steps.action: Enter URL with multiple query parameters 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/News?page=1&category=tech&sort=date&filter=active&search=product'
steps.expected: URL rewriting should process URL with query strings and identify the page
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=24&language=en-US&page=1, Identified Page: News, Culture: en-US

steps.expected: URL rewriting should handle special characters (& and <>) and identify the page
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=132&language=en-US, Identified Page: Test & <Special> Page!, Culture: en-US

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test malformed URLs for error handling

steps.action: Enter malformed URL 'not-a-valid-url' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should display appropriate error message for invalid URL format
steps.actual: All result fields show 'None', Operation Messages: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined.'

steps.action: Enter internationalized URL with Spanish locale 'http://localhost:8081/es-ar/Our-Products'
steps.expected: URL rewriting should correctly identify the Spanish (Argentina) locale
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=es-AR, Identified Page: Our Products, Culture: es-AR

observations: Admin-only access restriction verified - TestUrlRewriting API requires Administrators role as seen in source code [DnnAuthorize(StaticRoles = 'Administrators')]
The TEST URL tab provides two testing functions: 'Test a Page URL' for URL generation and 'Test URL Rewriting' for URL parsing
URL rewriting correctly handles various URL formats including those with query strings, special characters, and different locales
Error handling is robust - invalid URIs are gracefully handled with descriptive error messages
